definitions.text: a junction where one street or road crosses another
a point or set of points common to two or more geometric configurations
the set of elements common to two or more sets
examples: the set of red hats is the intersection of the set of hats and the set of red things

definitions.text: a representation of common ground between theories or phenomena
examples: there was no overlap between their proposals

definitions.text: the act of intersecting (as joining by causing your path to intersect your target's path)
